text: Kim Kuk-young ( or ; born 19 April 1991) is a South Korean track and field sprinter who competed in the 100 metres. He set a national record in the men's 100-meter sprint at the 2015 Summer Universiade. ==References== ==External links== * * Category:South Korean male sprinters Category:Athletes (track and field) at the 2010 Asian Games Category:Athletes (track and field) at the 2014 Asian Games Category:Athletes (track and field) at the 2018 Asian Games Category:World Athletics Championships athletes for South Korea Category:People from Anyang, Gyeonggi Category:1991 births Category:Living people Category:Athletes (track and field) at the 2016 Summer Olympics Category:Olympic athletes of South Korea Category:Asian Games competitors for South Korea Category:Competitors at the 2015 Summer Universiade
title: Kim Kuk-young
